name: Tricktreat
description:
A simple but yet cool or kind awesome ,short little Halloween,fun game with gags,eastereggs and a senless story about a Human (Male) what is trying to survive just this one night!

Hint:
The game has 2 endings.
A bunch of events,lights,and creepy/Scarry stuff in it with a Spezial End^^

Gameplay:
Start the Game and read the onscreen text.

Controls:
Use "Arrowkeys" to move
Enter/Spacebar = Use stuff
Alt+Enter = Toggle Fullscreen-Mode

*The game was made wit the RPG Maker XP (Enterbrain)
Credits goes to Nagata (Me) and Nagisa (Grafics).
